title: ModaLisboa - Lisboa Fashion Week'25
description: [ March ] Portuguese designers present their new collections and trends for the next Autumn/Winter.

title: Lisbon Half Marathon'25
description: One of the most important athletic events in Lisbon, the course reaches its pinnacle with the crossing of the Bridge 25th of April.

title: IndieLisboa'25
description: The IndieLisboa festival will once again bring films, short films, animation, documentaries for us to discover over 11 days ... a celebration of independent cinema!

title: Italian Film Festival'25
description: Festa do Cinema Italiano / Italian Film Festival is the leading festival in Portugal for those who are passionate about the italian films and culture.

title: Sónar Lisboa'25
description: Sónar Lisboa | the festival which focuses on electronic music and digital culture and through a multicultural programme will bring new ways of give life to the dance floors.

title: Arco Lisboa - International Contemporary Art Fair'25
description: The ARCOlisboa International Contemporary Art Fair returns with a selection of galleries and a commitment to Portuguese art and its connections to the international scene.

title: FIMFA - International Festival of Puppetry and Animated Forms
description: [ May ] Marionettes and animated forms from all over the world descend on the capital.

title: Lisbon Festivities
description: In June, the month of its Patron Saints, Lisboa is celebrating in a festive atmosphere: music, dance and much more.

title: NOS Alive'25
description: “The best line-up ever” is coming back to the Passeio Marítimo de Algés for another edition of the NOS Alive festival.

title: O Sol da Caparica
description: [ August ]  The Parque Urbano da Costa Caparica once again plays host to the biggest Lusophone music festival.

title: EDP Lisbon Marathon'25
description: 42 kms distance Marathon sets off from Cascais and follows the Coastal Road (Estrada Marginal) until the finish line at Lisbon's Praça do Comércio.

title: French Film Festival
description: Lisboa once again hosts the French Film Festival, a great cinema celebration.

title: Doclisboa – Festival Internacional de Cinema'25
description: [ October ]  Entirely dedicated to documentaries, will bring the best of the contemporary national and international production.

title: LEFFEST | Lisboa Film Festival'25
description: [ November ] Great artists, filmmakers, actors, writers and intellectuals meet once again for the Lisboa Film Festival.
